## What’s new?

**Enterprise role: `View enterprise Copilot metrics`**

You can now access the **Copilot Usage Metrics APIs and Dashboard** if you are assigned the new enterprise role:

**`View enterprise Copilot metrics`**

This important expansion means that **all users assigned this role**, not just enterprise admins or billing managers, are empowered to view granular Copilot usage metrics for your enterprise.

## Who can now access Copilot usage metrics?

- **Any user** with the `View enterprise Copilot metrics`
role
- Enterprise admins and billing managers continue to have default access.

## How to get started

1. Ensure you have the `Copilot usage metrics`
policy enabled under `AI Controls` > `Copilot` .
2. Assign your users the new `View enterprise Copilot metrics`
enterprise role under `People` > `Enterprise roles` .
3. Advise your newly assigned users to visit the **Copilot Usage Metrics APIs and Dashboard** to begin leveraging insights today.

Learn more about [Copilot usage metrics](https://docs.github.com/en/enterprise-cloud@latest/rest/copilot/copilot-usage-metrics?apiVersion=2022-11-28).
